item.title: [Linux] Mulren
item.description: Mulren mulren.sh is a bash script for renaming multiple files according to a given pattern. Download: mulren.sh How to use : Example: rename a set of files testfile_a.txt to hello_file001.txt: Example: rename a set of files “Artist - Track 01.ogg” to “Artist_Track_01.ogg”:
